title: House for sale in Ja-Ela
details:
A beautiful single storied house with a large garden

The house consists of 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, Dining room, Living room.
A land with house consist of 20 Perches
Parking for 2 vehicle parking
Few coconut trees around the house

2 mints walk to Colombo Negombo main road & 5 minis to Ja Ela town

Price:- 18 M (negotiable)

Please call for more information
